title: SimCity.Digital.Deluxe.Edition.Repack-z10yded
description:
SimCity.Digital.Deluxe.Edition.Repack-z10yded

Year: 2013
Genre: Strategy (God Sim / Manage / Busin. / Real-time) / 3D
Publication Type: Repack
Language: English / Russian
Language: English
Crack: 3DM 

System requirements:

OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7/8
Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000 + 
/ Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0GHz processor or higher
Memory: 2 GB
Video: ATI Radeon HD 2400 / nVidia 7800 / Intel HD 
Graphics or more modern (Minimum 256MB of internal 
memory and support for Shader 3.0 or higher)
DirectX : 9.0c
Hard disk: 4 GB 

Description:
The famous town-planning simulator! 

Show the world what a real mayor! In SimCity you manage a living city, 
populated by different people with different desires and aspirations. 
Found the city easier, the real challenge and interest in the game is 
the control you created a complex and dynamic environment. 

You will also have the opportunity to interact with other players online 
in real time. You can share your resources or to hoard wealth for the 
sake of profit. New construction tools help you easily change the game 
in their own way, but remember that when it comes to pollution, crime 
or natural disasters, you would like the help of friends. 

But you decide. Build a society of their dreams. You are only limited 
by their own ambitions. 
Will you build a city that will stand the test of time?

Features repack

- Release is based on SimCity Digital Deluxe Edition
- Cut: nothing
- Recoded: nothing
- Game Version: 10.0.0.0
- Setup time: ~ 4 minutes 

- Additional content:
+ Cities Of Tomorrow
+ Airship Set
+ Attraction Set
+ British City Set
+ French City Set
+ German City Set
+ Heroes & Villains Set
+ Micromania Shop Set
+ Progressive Insurence Set
+ Red Cross Disaster Relief Set
+ Amusement Park
+ Houses of Worship
+ Media Markt
+ Metro Building
+ Play shop
+ Telia Store
+ Launch Park
+ Nissan Leaf 

(!) Additional content does not work on Windows XP 

Repack from z10yded
